Title: Spaghetti Bolognese
Description: A classic Italian pasta dish with rich, meaty sauce.
Instructions: Boil the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onions and garlic.
Add minced beef and cook until browned.
Stir in canned tomatoes and simmer for 20 minutes.

Title: Chicken Curry
Description: A flavorful and spicy chicken curry dish.
Instructions: Heat oil in a pot and sauté onions and garlic.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in curry powder and cook for 1 minute.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes.

Title: Vegetable Stir Fry
Description: A quick and easy vegetable stir fry with a savory sauce.
Instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok.
Add garlic and stir fry until fragrant.
Add vegetables and stir fry for 5-7 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and stir well.

Title: Beef Tacos
Description: Delicious beef tacos with fresh toppings.
Instructions: Cook beef and onion in a pan until browned.
Add taco seasoning and stir well.
Assemble tacos with beef mixture, lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese.
